mapper.select: select * from user_info where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}

select c.ext_id, (select user_name from user_info where user_id = c.users) user_name, count(c.user_name) count_Stu, (select str_class_date from ext_info where ext_id = c.ext_id) str_class_date, (select prof_photo from user_info where user_id = c.users) prof_photo from app_class a, (select b.user_id, u.user_name, b.ext_id, e.str_class_date, u.prof_photo, e.user_id users from app_class b, user_info u, ext_info e where b.user_id = u.user_id and b.reg_stus = '결제완료' and b.ext_id = e.ext_id) c where a.ext_id = c.ext_id and c.user_id = #{user_id} and sysdate() >= c.str_class_date group by c.ext_id

select t.*, e.user_name from ext_timetable t, (select u.user_name, e.ext_id from user_info u, ext_info e where u.user_id = e.user_id) e where t.user_id = #{user_id} and t.ext_id = e.ext_id and SUBSTR(t.ext_id, 2, 1) = '1'
select e.*, u.user_name from ext_timetable e, user_info u where ext_id = (select ext_id from app_class where user_id = #{user_id} and SUBSTR(ext_id, 2,1) != '1') and e.user_id = u.user_id
select u.user_name, u.prof_photo, e.ext_obj, e.ext_way, e.class_lev, e.tuit_fees from user_info u, ext_info e where u.user_id = e.user_id and ext_id = #{ext_id}
select post_id, post_title, post_cont, att_file, post_date from posting_list where ext_id = #{ext_id} and post_code = '1'

select pl.post_id, pl.post_title, pl.post_cont, pl.post_date, pl.end_date, h.post_id AS 'submitStus' from posting_list pl left outer join homework_info h on pl.post_id = h.post_id where pl.ext_id = #{ext_id} and pl.post_code = '2'

select a.test_id, count(*) AS count, a.date_gaze, b.test_date, (select count(w_answ_note) AS count from test_result where w_answ_note != '' AND test_id = a.test_id) AS wrong_note from test_result a, (select b.prob_id, b.prob_answ, t.ext_id, t.test_date from prob_info b, test_info t where b.test_id = t.test_id) b where a.prob_id = b.prob_id and a.stu_result = b. prob_answ and a.user_id = #{user_id} and b.ext_id = #{ext_id} group by a.test_id

select t.test_id, t.prob_id, t.stu_result, p.prob_answ, t.date_gaze, t.w_answ_note from prob_info p, (select test_id, prob_id, stu_result, date_gaze, w_answ_note from test_result where user_id = #{user_id} and test_id = #{test_id}) t where p.prob_id = t.prob_id order by prob_id
mapper.update: update test_result set w_answ_note = #{wrongNoteCont} where prob_id = #{prob_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from stu_info where user_id = #{user_id} and ext_id = #{ext_id} order by post_date desc
select distinct(t.day_week) AS day_week, e.str_class_date from ext_timetable t, ext_info e where t.ext_id = e.ext_id and t.ext_id = #{ext_id}
